languages.text: "Дело такое — мы честные, тихие заключенные. Мы не хотели бунтовать! Да не вышло вот отсидеться. Тех, кто мятеж не поддержал, быстренько порешили комендантовы прихвостни. Пришлось нам того... подыграть. Но мы это понарошку. Не имеем, значит, намерения оскорблять губернатора Медину и законную власть Винтерскейлов".

"Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't really an option either. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to join in the festivities. So we had to — you know — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant no offence to Governor Medineh nor to the lawful authority of House Winterscale."
languages.original_text: "Дело такое — мы честные, тихие заключенные. Мы не хотели бунтовать! Да не вышло вот отсидеться. Тех, кто мятеж не поддержал, быстренько порешили комендантовы прихвостни. Пришлось нам того... подыграть. Но мы это понарошку. Не имеем, значит, намерения оскорблять губернатора Медину и законную власть Винтерскейлов".

traits.locale_text: "Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't an option. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to rise up. So we had to — how do you say it — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant to offend Governor Medineh and the lawful authority of House Winterscale."

"Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't an option. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to rise up. So we had to — how do you say it — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant to offend Governor Medineh and the lawful authority of House Winterscale."

We never meant no offence to Governor Medineh nor to the lawful authority of House Winterscale."

languages.text: «La situación es la siguiente: somos reclusos honestos y pacíficos. ¡No pretendíamos amotinarnos! Pero, bueno, quedarnos al margen tampoco era una opción válida. Los esbirros del alcaide se libraron de aquellos que se negaron a unirse a la fiesta en un abrir y cerrar de ojos, por lo que tuvimos que seguirles la corriente, ¿entiende? Pero ¡eso es todo! ¡Fue solo un juego! Nunca quisimos ofender al gobernador Medineh ni a la autoridad legítima de la casa Winterscale».
languages.original_text: "Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't really an option either. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to join in the festivities. So we had to — you know — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant no offence to Governor Medineh nor to the lawful authority of House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: «La situación es la siguiente: somos reclusos honestos y pacíficos. ¡No pretendíamos amotinarnos! Pero, bueno, quedarnos al margen tampoco era una opción válida. Los esbirros del alcaide se libraron de aquellos que se negaron a unirse a la fiesta en un abrir y cerrar de ojos, por lo que tuvimos que seguirles la corriente, ¿entiende? Pero ¡eso es todo! ¡Fue solo un juego! Nunca quisimos ofender al gobernador Medineh ni a la autoridad legítima de la casa Winterscale».

languages.text: "Es ist so: Wir sind ehrliche, ruhige Insassen. Wir wollten keinen Aufstand anzetteln! Aber, nun ja, es einfach auszusitzen, war auch keine Option. Die Schoßhunde des Direktors haben kurzen Prozess mit allen gemacht, die sich nicht an den Feierlichkeiten beteiligen wollten. Also mussten wir ... nun ja ... mitspielen. Aber das war alles, ein Spiel! Wir wollten Gouverneur Medineh oder die rechtmäßige Autorität von Haus Winterzunder nie beleidigen."
languages.original_text: "Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't really an option either. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to join in the festivities. So we had to — you know — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant no offence to Governor Medineh nor to the lawful authority of House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist so: Wir sind ehrliche, ruhige Insassen. Wir wollten keinen Aufstand anzetteln! Aber, nun ja, es einfach auszusitzen, war auch keine Option. Die Schoßhunde des Direktors haben kurzen Prozess mit allen gemacht, die sich nicht an den Feierlichkeiten beteiligen wollten. Also mussten wir ... nun ja ... mitspielen. Aber das war alles, ein Spiel! Wir wollten Gouverneur Medineh oder die rechtmäßige Autorität von Haus Winterzunder nie beleidigen."

languages.text: « Je vais vous dire : nous, on est de braves prisonniers, pas agités pour un sou. On était contre cette émeute ! Mais on nous a pas franchement laissé le choix. Les toutous du directeur ont liquidé tous ceux qui refusaient de se joindre aux festivités, alors vous comprenez, on a bien dû... jouer le jeu, quoi. Mais c'était vraiment que ça, un jeu ! On voulait surtout pas offenser le gouverneur Medineh ou s'opposer à l'autorité de la maison Winterscale. »
languages.original_text: "Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't really an option either. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to join in the festivities. So we had to — you know — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant no offence to Governor Medineh nor to the lawful authority of House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous dire : nous, on est de braves prisonniers, pas agités pour un sou. On était contre cette émeute ! Mais on nous a pas franchement laissé le choix. Les toutous du directeur ont liquidé tous ceux qui refusaient de se joindre aux festivités, alors vous comprenez, on a bien dû... jouer le jeu, quoi. Mais c'était vraiment que ça, un jeu ! On voulait surtout pas offenser le gouverneur Medineh ou s'opposer à l'autorité de la maison Winterscale. »

languages.text: “是这样的，我们这都是老实巴交的犯人，我们根本不想暴动！但您看，我们也别无选择，反抗他们的人很快都被典狱长的走狗做掉了。所以我们只能，您懂的，陪他们玩玩，但也只是玩玩！我们从没想过要和梅迪涅总督作对，也从来不想冒犯温特斯凯尔家族的合法统治！”
languages.original_text: "Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't really an option either. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to join in the festivities. So we had to — you know — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant no offence to Governor Medineh nor to the lawful authority of House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: “是这样的，我们这都是老实巴交的犯人，我们根本不想暴动！但您看，我们也别无选择，反抗他们的人很快都被典狱长的走狗做掉了。所以我们只能，您懂的，陪他们玩玩，但也只是玩玩！我们从没想过要和梅迪涅总督作对，也从来不想冒犯温特斯凯尔家族的合法统治！”

languages.text: 「聞いてくれ、俺たちは正直で物静かな囚人だ。暴動なんて起こしたくなかったんだ！だがな、じっとしてるって選択肢もなかった。所長の飼い犬どもは、このお祭り騒ぎに加わることを拒否した連中をサッサと始末しちまった。だから仕方なく、その…付き合ってたんだ。だがそれだけだ…付き合っただけなんだ！俺たちは、メディネ総督や、ウィンタースケール家の合法的権力を貶めるつもりは毛頭なかった」
languages.original_text: "Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't really an option either. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to join in the festivities. So we had to — you know — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant no offence to Governor Medineh nor to the lawful authority of House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: 「聞いてくれ、俺達は正直で物静かな囚人だ。暴動なんて起こしたくなかったんだ！だがな、暴動に加わらないなんて事は絶対できなかったんだよ。所長の飼い犬は、このお祭り騒ぎに加担することを拒否した者をサッサと片付けてしまう。だから仕方なく、ほら、付き合ってたんだ。だがそれだけだ…付き合っただけ！俺達は、メディネ総督や、ウィンタースケール家の法的権力を貶めるつもりは毛頭なかった」
「聞いてくれ、俺たちは正直で物静かな囚人だ。暴動なんて起こしたくなかったんだ！だがな、じっとしてるって選択肢もなかった。所長の飼い犬どもは、このお祭り騒ぎに加わることを拒否した連中をサッサと始末しちまった。だから仕方なく、その…付き合ってたんだ。だがそれだけだ…付き合っただけなんだ！俺たちは、メディネ総督や、ウィンタースケール家の合法的権力を貶めるつもりは毛頭なかった」

languages.text: "İşin aslı şu ki bizler dürüst, sesi çıkmayan mahkûmlarız. İsyan etmek istemedik ama susup oturma lüksümüz de yoktu. Müdürün yalakaları, şenliklere katılmayı reddedenlerin faturasını bir çırpıda kesti. Bu yüzden... Anlayın işte, huylarına gitmemiz gerekiyordu ama o kadar, mış gibi yapıyorduk sadece! Ne Vali Medineh'e ne de Winterscale Hanesi'nin meşru otoritesine saldırma niyetindeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Here's the deal: we're honest, quiet inmates. We didn't want to riot! But, well, sitting it out wasn't really an option either. The warden's lapdogs made short work of those who refused to join in the festivities. So we had to — you know — play along. But that's all it was — play! We never meant no offence to Governor Medineh nor to the lawful authority of House Winterscale."
